Description: Here we have a BEAUTIFUL charvel San Dimas in a rare taxi cab yellow. Very little fretwear. This ones a real clean beauty. I have taken pics of the particular blemishes. Other than those - the rest of her is gorgeous. This ones a real beauty and was hand picked by me. You can’t go wrong. Generic gig bag. On June 13 2008, Charvel introduced the U.S.A. Production Model Series. This new line consists of three models in standard black: San Dimas® Style 1 and 2 and So-Cal Style 1. To keep things interesting, every three months or so, each model is released in in a limited custom color replacing its previous incarnation. This rotating custom color option on a production guitar has been met with wild enthusiasm by Charvel fans. The U.S.A Production Model Series is available only at select authorized dealers.
